resources.string: Manage your cards. Application developped by Kevin Le Perf aka codlab aka pokasmax

To display the different card, while displaying a specific extension, press the menu button and choose download.

\ To choose your extension, scroll the list and click on it.\Software developped by codlab aka pokasmax. Scans are provide by www.pokecardex.com.

This software is not endorsed, licenced or sponsored by Nintendo, GameFreak, The Pokemon Company ou or all other company affiliated by The Pokemon Company.

All rights, patents belongs to their owner.
This version can be ... slow when you scroll down an extension set or the Gallery, but in fact, it is because now, to improve memory, if an image has not his thumbnailed version, the application create it. This thing is made only one time when you see an extension set. So it will run smoothly after that ;)

Do not forget to download the cards through the Download button on the topbar or with the menu button available on your smartphones/tablet. Please update the application on all your smartphones/tablets to be able to make synchronization between devices !! I had to change the upload/download process and previous save are not compatible with this core (... it is also debugged now ;)
The package\'s url returned an error
The mail provided is not correct
Send mail directly to pokeke100@gmail.com to request reset password, lost one or whatever.
Are you sure you want to download information? Can erase some information and does not reset previous ones
Are you sure you want to upload this device information? Will erase previous on the server

Currently in beta. A push version will arrive soon. Thanks to report any bug or any comments.
No TCGO Code will be backed up / restored !
Do you want to delete this code?
Magikarp is now waiting for you !
Unlock Magikarp for your BW / BW2 games
Download your free Magikarp on the Black/White 1/2 GTS (the NDS/3DS and this device must be on the same Wifi network!)

In order to retrieve your Magikarp, go to the Nintendo DS Wifi Connexion settings. On a 3DS, you must be on this screen and NOT the 3DS Connexion since the games are using the NDS Wifi and not the 3DS one.
Click on the Wifi Connexion you are currently using (note that if you have multiple Wifi Connexion saved on your NDS/3DS, you only need to changed the one you are using to connect on to internet.

Now deactivate the auto dns configuration. You need to set the value of the first rown to 94.125.160.65. And click on save. You can try to test the Connection with Internet now. If you have set this DNS value, it will be ok. Now Click on the previous button to activate the Magikarp on the GTS for your network ; go to the GTS from your Black/White 1 or 2 and it will be downloaded to your Game, ready to be transfered to X/Y !
This Magikarp is free, will never be sold, is legit (but yeah... cloned...) - I really like him so please be gentle with him :)

You are currently using the Android ported app to Blackberry. Due to an issue with the opening webview and the soft keyboard of your device, please enter here your login info. THese will be copied in the login page from the Google Authentication Page.
Click on the banner to download the newest Flappi Kachu game for your device!
